tool_description: This API extracts text data from PDF documents.  It can be used to create HTML documents that have high fidelity with the look of a PDF document.  Alternatively it can be used to create documents which capture the main parts of the document: sections, paragraphs, tables, lists and footnotes.  It also supports extraction to Word 2007, Excel 2007, JSON and plain text.
title: PDF Converter

api_list.name: Convert URL
api_list.description: Converts pdf files to html, docx, xlsx, json and txt files

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL for pdf file to convert. Make sure the file has a content type of "application/pdf". Max file size is 10 MB.

optional_parameters.name: endPage
optional_parameters.description: Ending page of conversion. Use 1 for first page. Defaults to last page.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format. Valid values are html, html2, docx, xlsx, txt and json. Defaults to html.

optional_parameters.name: startpage
optional_parameters.description: Starting page of conversion. Use 1 for first page. Defaults to first page.

api_list.name: Convert File
api_list.description: Converts pdf files to html, docx, xlsx, json and txt files

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: Pdf file to convert.  Make sure the file has a content type of "application/pdf".  Max file size is 10 MB.

optional_parameters.name: endPage
optional_parameters.description: Ending page of conversion.  Use 1 for first page.  Defaults to last page.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format.  Valid values are html, html2, docx, xlsx, txt and json.  Defaults to html.

optional_parameters.name: startPage
optional_parameters.description: Starting page of conversion.  Use 1 for first page.  Defaults to first page.
